data.name: FeatureStateEvent
desc: This event is broadcast by a Controller whenever the state of the feature changes.

items.name: FeatureDescriptor
lines: contains a descriptor of the feature for the user interface.

items.name: FeatureURL
lines: contains the URL of the feature.

items.name: IsEnabled
lines: specifies whether the feature is currently enabled or disabled.

items.name: Requery
lines: specifies whether the XDispatch has to be required.
Interest code should listen for FrameActionEvent too, to update own feature states and dispatch listener on FrameAction.CONTEXT_CHANGED.

items.name: State
lines: contains the state of the feature in this dispatch.
This can be, for example, simply TRUE for a boolean feature like underline on/off. Some simple types like string or boolean are useful here for generic UI elements, like a checkmark in a menu.
